    • Method Detail

      • getBooksFromLatLong

        List<Book> getBooksFromLatLong(double latitude,
                               double longitude,
                               int radius)
                        throws BookNotFoundException
        Gets a List of books from a latitude and a longitude.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude.
        longitude - The longitude.
        radius - The radius of the search.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Exception is thrown if no books are found.

      • getBooksAndCitiesFromAuthor

        List<Book> getBooksAndCitiesFromAuthor(String name)
                                throws BookNotFoundException
        Returns a List of books an author has written.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the author.
        Returns:
        The books the author has written.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Is thrown if no books are found.

      • getCitiesFromBook

        List<Location> getCitiesFromBook(String title)
                          throws BookNotFoundException
        Returns a List of books where cities mentioned in a book is in.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of a book.
        Returns:
        The books where the cities are mentioned.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Is thrown if no books are found.

      • getAuthorsAndBookFromCity

        List<Book> getAuthorsAndBookFromCity(String name)
                              throws BookNotFoundException
        Returns a List of books which has a specific location somewhere in the text.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the location that is mentioned.
        Returns:
        The books where the location is mentioned.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Is thrown if no books are found.

      • searchForAuthor

        List<String> searchForAuthor(String name)
                      throws BookNotFoundException
        Enables searching of author. Returns a list of Strings with author names.
        Parameters:
        name - The partial name of an author.
        Returns:
        A collection of String names of authors.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Is thrown if there is no authors with the name.

      • searchForBook

        List<String> searchForBook(String title)
                    throws BookNotFoundException
        Enables searching of books. Returns a list of Strings with book titles.
        Parameters:
        title - The partial title of a book.
        Returns:
        A collection of String names of books.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Is thrown if there is no Books with the title.

      • searchForCity

        List<String> searchForCity(String name)
                    throws BookNotFoundException
        Enables searching of cities. Returns a list of Strings with city names.
        Parameters:
        name - The partial name of a city.
        Returns:
        A collection of String titles of cities.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Is thrown if there is no cities with the names.
